import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { User } from 'src/app/interface/user'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/service/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { @Input() user: User; constructor(private router: Router, private userService: UserService) { } logOut(): void{ this.userService.logOut(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
